ovdesc.p: This ‘L’ type application contains the multi-value list of all the outward files successfully generated for each presentation date.
It is used by the enquiry SEPA.OUTWARD.FILES as a pre-selection to identify all the outward files presented within a range of dates.

desc.p: This Field holds the Key to the previous table. A sub-value may be used to regroup all the XML messages issued on the same file but recorded under different file keys.
This field specifies the Foreseen presentation date.
